name: Reverso Curso
description:
You are a master wizard at the Tuti-Fruti Arcana School. While studying magical texts, you became cursed- you lost your mind and rampaged through the school, transforming students into bananas with your powerful magic. Using rare 'Reverso Crystals,' walk back in time and undo your spells. While you're at it, find and destroy the books that cursed you!

Avoid enemy projectiles and catch your own from where they were shot in the past!

WASD/ Arrow Keys to control

Left Mouse Click/ Space to dash.
